verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: 'Twas Jesus' blood that ransomed me, From chains of sin He set me free. While ages roll, my song shall be: 'Twas Jesus' blood that ransomed me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I ne'er could be at peace with God, But for the cleansing, crimson flood, No one but Christ would win Atonement for all sin-- He signed my pardon with His blood.

verse.name: v3
